description:
Hmm?  Youngest?
Whatcha doing?  Oh, you`re changing the light?
You can`t reach it, huh...here, you can ride on my shoulders.  Upsy-daisy...
What?  What`s wrong?  You wanna get down?  But you didn`t change the light!
Huh?!  Youngest hates me now!
What happened?  Did I do something weird?  No...I just lifted her up like normal...
Maybe she thinks I`m a freak like everyone else in this class and she shouldn`t hang out with me.
No...I`m not like them!
Source: crunchyroll
